user_id.description: The ID of the user who made the booking.

person_in_charge.description: Name of the person responsible for the booking.

venue.description: The name of the booked venue (e.g., '會議室 A').

booking_date.description: The date of the booking in YYYY-MM-DD format.

start_time.description: The start time of the booking in HH:MM format.

end_time.description: The end time of the booking in HH:MM format.

id.description: The unique identifier for the booking. This is the primary key.

database.instructions: A simple venue booking system. Create records in the 'bookings_v2' collection. Check for scheduling conflicts before creating a new booking.
